FuncDef: The reset dragonfly pfc adjust statistics command clears statistics on dragonfly deadlock prevention. The reset dragonfly pfc adjust statistics command clears statistics on dragonfly deadlock prevention. This command is supported only on the CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P and CE8850-HAM.
ExtraInfo: You can run this command to clear statistics on dragonfly deadlock prevention.
